sentence.Network_en: You feel you really are completely worthless and unlovable.
sentence.Network_cn: 你会觉得自己真是毫无价值，一点也不讨人喜欢。

sentence.Network_en: In the end she blamed herself for being unlovable.
sentence.Network_cn: 最终她只能怪罪自己不讨人喜欢.

sentence.Network_en: Learn to love with all your heart and accept the unlovable side of others.
sentence.Network_cn: 学会用自己全部真心去爱一个人,去接受他(她)的那些不可爱的地方.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I choose to forgive ; I choose to open my heart and love what is unlovable .我选择宽恕，我选择打开心灵并热爱那些不可爱的事物。
had harsh words ; a harsh and unlovable old tyrant ., 言辞苛刻 ; 苛刻的不可爱的年老的暴君.
7..8.unlovable a. 不可爱的；不讨人喜爱的-

list.abs: besides the fact that unloving thoughts rebound to the sender , negative thoughts can also cause harm to the other person .除了不是爱的想法会反弹回来给发出想法的人之外，负面的想法确实会对对方造成伤害。
in his unlovely word , it would be “ routinised ” .以他的粗言粗语来说，太空将被“常规化”。
Unlove you歌词翻译_百度知道 ... Unlove You 歌词 I can't unlove you 我不能不爱你 Can't do that 不能这样做.

entry.tran: 不招人喜欢的；不可爱的
entry.def: If someone is unlovable, they are not likely to be loved by anyone, because they do not have any attractive qualities.

means.word_mean: 1. incapable of inspiring love or affection;

sentences.sentence: "she was in some mysterious way...unlovable"-Joseph Conrad

auth_sentence.content: The practical spirit is an essential but unlovable spirit.
auth_sentence.res_content: The practical spirit is an essential but unlovable spirit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The practical spirit is an essential but unlovable spirit.

auth_sentence.content: And after all the Sturm und Drang, the resulting and widely unloved deal was distinctly unlovable.
auth_sentence.res_content: And after all the Sturm und Drang, the resulting and widely unloved deal was distinctly unlovable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And after all the Sturm und Drang, the resulting and widely unloved deal was distinctly unlovable.
